First off this is a great horror game. There are some bugs but thats expected with almost any game that just game out. Playing as a survivor is a lot of fun, same goes for playing as the "monster" or "killer". The game only just came out and I am really enjoying it so far, I've had lots of fun and lots of moments where I wanted to smash my keyboard (but didn't). 

There is not that many bugs as you'd expect. Sometimes in stead of using your steam account as the character it picks up your computer as the character, made me think that I lost all my progress but really just had to sign out and sign back into steam. That is the only bug I have ran into so far.

The fact that you can not play with your friends in a public match made me a little mad. Yes you can play a game with your friends in a private match but you don't get anything toward your level and it's not as fun as playing public match. So if they could implement it where you can play with friends without having to play a private match that would be really cool. 

In all the game is incredible and if you are thinking about buying it you really should.

It's a fun game.

pros:
- you get to play as survivor or killer (There is a small selection for both survivor and killer).
- There's a rank system and you can get various items. However, they do get used when you enter a match.
- The maps are big and creepy.
- This game made me spill my coffee and burned my crotch. It was an intense moment when the killer is near you.

cons:
- Minor lag in a match sometimes. But it is not a severe issue for me at least.
- The maps tend to be an outside environment. I would like some indoors maps as well.

The game has some great potential since the developers do interact with the players. In addition, the developers made some bug fixes and they do their best to fix them ASAP. If you're not convinced, watch some gameplay videos on youtube.

edit(08/19/16: They fixed matchmaking!)

This game's matchmaking system is horrible. If you want to play with a friend, DO NOT GET THIS GAME. There is no party system, there is no server search system. The only way to get matched with your friends is to either have 4 other friends and create a custom server, or repeatedly join random lobbies until you happen to join the same lobby. Essentially it becomes 1000 sided dice the game.

I can't believe a game that claims it's not in early access alpha is lacking such basic functionality.

黎明杀鸡是那种开始玩就会非常上瘾的小游戏。
喜欢恐怖合作题材的朋友值得入这款佳作。
这是个讲四个偷电贼以及一个农场主的故事。
在游戏中你可以扮演汪涵、大张伟、蔡明、吉克隽逸的偷电贼一方，
又或者扮演锯子男、隐身男、夹子男的农场主一方。
游戏随着等级提升而解锁各项技能和物品
对于新手来说相对比较利好，可以循序渐进慢慢深入。
建议新人开发电机的时候千万别紧张，注意提示音；
屠夫一方的话追人注意偷电贼跑路方向，遇到无敌房场景莫去房内追，优先其他的
说下缺点，官方没有中文，但是三大妈上有中文MOD
游戏最可气的地方是有的玩家，尤其是偷电贼一方一被抓就喜欢拔线。
而且偷电贼一方拔线现在没有惩罚，屠夫的话因为对面拔线无法献祭从而不能加分
所以打排名的话屠夫一遇到拔线的基本上很难晋级，因此又叫做拔线杀机

Sloppy, bug-filled launch clearly rushed for E3.
No ranked party-up with friends system at launch means people lobby-hop until they find their friends, meaning it takes forever to actually get into a game.
(You can play "Kill your Friends mode, but you won't rank up or get any blood points or items, so what's the point?)
Whiny player-base consisting of people that immediately disconnect the moment they start losing.
Unbalanced elements present in the Open Beta still in full force.
Has 3 killers at launch but everyone just plays the Wraith due to being hilariously broken.

Don't launch your multi-player games like this.  I can't recommend it in its current state.
Good game to hang with your friends.

Well first off the ranking system is horrible, It its a absolute nightmare to try to rank up, second the matching system for ranking is even worse.  rank 20 vs ranked 1 is just lose with the elte perks the ranked one will have.  

Second off the cheese in this game is unreal,  as a survivor there is so many places you can just jump back and forth over and over and the killer cannot reach you.. I mean literally you both can sit there for hours upon hours going back and forth if you want. 

And most killers just camp now because of the cheese system.  The potential is HUGE but they really need to rework quite a few things for this game to shine or else its gonna turn into another titan fall or evolve and turn into a graveyard game.

Very cool concept, and it could easily work. However, the way they've implemented some aspects of it is completely broken. 

There is a lobby system, where you get put into a random lobby. There is no matchmaking beyond this. If you're new and playing as a survivor, you can be put together with 3 other new survivors and have to escape from a monster player that is very experienced, with many hugely advantageous perks, items, and offerings. You'll have none of these, and you cant even see the killer name, rank, perks, anything until after the game, so you can't simply try to switch to a lobby more balanced for your level. This brings me to my next point. . .

Most perks have a very clear advantage (more speed, less cooldown between attacks, break down barricades faster, see downed survivor outlines, etc for monster, faster healing, healing yourself without medic, sprinting, etc as survivor). If all perks were available for all players in the same lobby, I wouldnt find this an issue. But if you're a new player (and you can only equip 1 perk as a new player, and you'll only have a few common ones to choose from) and you're put against someone who has 4 ultra rare (read:ultra powerful) perks, your chance to win, and chance to have fun drop like a rock. Think that's enough? The high ranked players you can randomly be put up against can also equip offerings and items with attachments. Most of these are harmless, like add slightly more charges to a medkit or toolbox, or increase the chance to get a certain map. Some of these can be completely broken, including one killer offering that allows you to kill all survivors when they're downed instantly. This is basically a free win for any competent killer, as downing someone is mostly trivial, but keeping them on a hook is where the real challenge for a killer is. Do you camp the survivor on a hook, or try to stop more generators going up? None of that, because the killer used an offering that basically gave him a free win, with no counterplay, except. . .

July 3 update - A patch fixed most of the broken perk issues. Section removed.

Speaking of winning games, there is a ranking system in the game. The most poorly made one I've ever seen in a video game. I've survived a round, activating 3 generators while distracting the killer for a decent time, and still lost a rank due to only gaining 9.7k points (you need 10k to rank up, any less and you rank down instead. 3k for 3 gens, 5k for surviving, the rest miscallaneous for skill checks, being chased). Instead, people have to rely on cheeseing the game to have a consistant way to rank up, such as purposefully getting hit by the killer for a few extra points, or purposefully allowing a survivor to wiggle free and regrabbing them due to being point starved if you instead go for the objective and try to kill the enemy team as efficiently as possible. It has been one of the most frustrating experiences in all of my time playing when I deranked after hooking all 4 survivors, but because a few of them disconnected before i got the 'sacrificed' points I didnt earn enough points to reach 10k. Quite frankly, getting blasted in the face by a spinbotter in CSGO is more enjoyable.

And on to my last point... The bugs. Downed survivors can become ungrabbable, so you're forced to just watch as they crawl their way to an escape hatch while they're effectively invincible. You can also get stuck if a survivor drops a wodden pallet perfectly on you, ending your game. These wouldnt be a problem if they didnt occur so frequently.

The very, very worst part of this game, to me, is that there is actually something really, really fun and addicting in the game. Hell, I'll probably play the game some more over the week. However, I can't possible recommend this to anyone because, quite frankly, I've seen random free to play korean trash make better balancing and design decisions. I'd love to edit my review in a few weeks time for the positive, and I'd love to switch my recommendation from a "No" to a "Yes" because the concept really is fun and fresh. But I'll need the developer to make those fixes before that happens.

The core idea of this game seems like a really good idea, but the execution has been ground down in the name of balance since its release. The good parts of this game have slowly been drowned by an avalanche of terrible mechanics and decisions by one of the most embarrassing developer teams I've seen maintaining a competitive multiplayer game. There are many perks, characters, maps, offerings, systems, etc. that are just completely unfun to be on the receiving end of. Survivors are usually at the mercy of the killers decision to allow a fun match, especially at lower ranks where new players start out. Playing competitively will often mean denying the survivors a fun match because of the terrible ranking system. The truly fun and competitive way to play is enforced by the community, not the game. That is, if the fun parts even work correctly - which is not as often as it should be. It's especially terrible in this game where every second in the match is so precious. It's not uncommon as a survivor to get downed a few feet away from a window or from behind a pallet, or to have your exhaustion perks not function as they're supposed to. As a killer, it depends on which character you play. Some are worse than others.

This game does have a deceptively high skill ceiling and there's a lot of streamers who are really good at this game, watching them play can be very impressive. This game blends game knowledge, skill, macro play, and teamwork really well whenever it's allowed. It's a shame that the good parts of this game seem so hard to find. It makes me sad to have such negative opinions on this game because I used to think it was great - I bought it on release. I don't blame people for sticking with this game for so long, since it really is very unique. It's not like an FPS game, where you can take your pick if you don't like one out of the million.

I unfortunately don't recommend this game, hopefully this will change in the future. All the problems with this game could be fixed in time, but we'll just have to see.

I cannot recommend this game for a simple reason: Balance is utterly broken.

Survivors have perks that make them almost impossible to fight, and some maps are badly designed, which results in survivors being impossible to catch.

Cheaters are everywhere. People cheat for levels, and as such gain max-level perks.

People disconnect all the time, which is bad for both sides. Killers have noone to kill and gain no points, and Survivors gain no points since they can't escape / are left without teammates to help them.

Wraith is absolutely useless.

Game is plagued by numerous bugs, and there are too many to list here, this is not a bug list.

Propably the main problem is the ranking system. First of all, it has no reason to be there at all. Literally. Second: People leave because they don't want to lose their rank. Third: Most high-rank players are people who abuse the system and gain them without deserving them, such as window-hopping mentioned above, or point farming with Wraith as killer.

Core gameplay is solid and if you have a group of 5 people who are willing to play in private matches, give it a go. Otherwise, wait until all the issues are patched. Devs promised to patch them, and also to add a party MM later (you can't queue with friends yet since that would be imbalanced).

Positives
-The ability to learn the different methods for avoiding the killer as well as strategies is quite fun
-The random aspect of the bloodweb is great (perks/items ect for leveling up)
-The game can be very suspenseful if you have a good killer

Current Negitives
-Way too easy to lose ranking (hear stories of people dropping from rank 17 to 20 in 1 loss) Personally I've lost 2 dots from 1 match
-The music is way too loud, not to mention repetitive (had to have volume at 8% when i started. With headphones)

I really enjoy that the devs seem to be trying to listen to the community and I've been following their twitch ect. They seem content on making the game better and I really hope that they keep their energy forward.

[h1][b]Dead by daylight 
Lack of ideas isn´t justifiable[/b][/h1]

Nos encontramos ante la típica trama hollywoodense de película de terror donde un grupo de universitarios trataran de hacerle ver lo bella que es la vida a un psicópata de un lugar alejado de toda civilización, sin embargo las cosas salen mal y te vez obligado a tomar la decisión de tu vida transformándote en el héroe que trata de salvar a la rubia, en el genio que planea como huir del lugar, en la chica escurridiza que se la pasa distrayendo al psicópata o en el hijo de puta que escapa del lugar dejando a todos tus compañeros atrás. También podrás tomar el papel del psicópata tu propósito es proteger tu hogar de los extraños y si es posible asegurarte de que se reúnan en el otro mundo.

La mecánica es simple, tendrás dos formas de escapar la primera es poner a prueba tus dotes de mecánico y reparar 5 generadores, para así poder abrir una de las 2 salidas del sitio y huir, la segunda es esperar a que maten a tus compañeros y buscar una trampilla en el suelo por la cual escapar por la alcantarilla como la vil rata que eres.

Tras ser el primer título que juego de este estilo he de decir que es divertido, pero no llega a ser algo más allá de un juego regular, y es que al pasar un par de partidas el juego parece ser una beta pese a que steam y los desarrolladores digan lo contrario, y no me refiero a ello por aspectos técnicos (por que tiene muy poquísimos bugs y su optimización es aceptable al igual que sus graficos). Lo que lo hace parecer una beta es la poca variedad que se encuentra en el juego:

[list]
 [*] 3 mapas que se generan aleatoriamente cada partida, pero son completamente iguales, solo cambian los sembradíos de trigo por rocas, árboles y por pilas de chatarra.

 [*]Las habilidades de los supervivientes son solo una tontería como que te dan 3% más de velocidad al correr o un 10% para acertar en lo quick time event, y su equipamento algunas veces inútil como llevar una lámpara para segar al psicópata tras apuntarle 4 segundos al rostro (ni te imaginas de lo difícil que es mantener enfocado el haz de la luz en su rostro durante 4 segundos eso sin contar que la lámpara solo será útil durante 8).

 [*]Hablando de los quick time event creo que fue uno de los peores desaciertos y es que se presentan para reparar el generador de energía como para curarte a ti o a un compañero donde si fallas harás ruido suficiente para atraer a el psicópata (y no critico esto de llamar la atención del psicópata).

 [*]La mecánica por parte del psicópata es igual muy monótona y es que basta con dejarlos incapacitados y colgarlos de un gancho hasta esperar su muerte.
[/list]

[u][b]No pueden hacer un juego tan pobre en mecánicas teniendo tantas ideas plasmadas en el cine.[/b][/u]

Y es que pueden darle más variedad al juego creando un escenario de una mansión muy obscura donde el asesino vaya alumbrando los rincones para encontrar a los supervivientes mientras estos traten de escapar de ella explorando la mansión tratando de buscar herramientas que los ayuden a salir, abriendo puertas y toparse con un cuerpo colgado que fue serruchado por la mitad a manera de screamer, darle terror al protagonista al oír el ruido de sus botas en el piso de arriba, reinventar mecánicas de trampas más allá del cepo tanto para el sobreviviente como para el psicópata (sin llegar a ser mortales para este), como romper un vidrio para que al pasar por ahí nuevamente se genere ruido o colocar la alarma de un despertador para que oculte los demás ruidos que se puedan hacer, cambiar la forma de arreglar los generadores dejar los quick time event atrás y hacer un sistema como el de skyrim o thief para abrir cerraduras y de esta forma que hacer que dependa de habilidad y suerte el poder arreglar un motor, que el asesino no solo los cuelgue para matarlos si no que les corte un brazo y ellos puedan escapar tratando de buscar a un compañero para que les haga un torniquete y evitar su muerte. 

[b]Hay tantas opciones que pueden hacer un juego terrorífico y esta gente se a quedado cortos de ideas.

Como conclusión el juego es divertido, pero si no innova en cuanto a mecánicas está destinado a que en un par de meses quede en el olvido, pero por el precio al que esta es una compra aceptable. [/b]

[b]Puntuación 6[/b]

Playground Tag Simulator

The game is overall fun but comes with its share of bugs and glitches as well as the ability for some maps to have spots where the killer can never catch the survivor. a side note to this is that the devs are looking into this stuff a lot and are preping patches and fixes since the end of E3.
scary

Super Spiel! Ich bin total verliebt und kann mich abends immer nur schwer davon los reissen. 

Man kann zwischen 4 Überlebende wählen, die alle unterschiedliche Perks lernen können oder eben auch wählen zwischen 3 Killern die ebenso ihre Perks haben. Man levelt jeweils mit dem gewählten Charakter und muss Blutpunkte investieren, die man während des Überlebens, bzw. des Spiels, für verschiedene Aktionen bekommt. Dabei ist es egal ob man entkommt oder eben nicht, die Punkte werden angerechnet.

Man hat es sich zur Aufgabe gemacht 5 Generatoren anzuschmeissen, die überall auf der Karte verteilt sind, dabei ist wichtig, dass man ein wenig Teamplay beherrscht, da man oft nicht weit kommt, wenn man sturr den eigenen Weg geht und den anderen Überlebenden nicht hilft. Kommt es doch soweit und alle Teamkameraden sind getötet worden, hat man die Möglichkeit die restlichen Generatoren alleine anzuschmeissen oder man sucht die Geheimtür (Klappe im Boden)
 und flieht somit schnell. Allerdings ist die oft recht gemein auf der Karte versteckt. Das geht auch nur wenn man der letzte Überlebende ist, ansonsten ist die Klappe zu.

Die Maps wechseln mit jeder neuen Spielrunde und man kann die Wahl der Map nur mit Opfergaben (die man im Blutnetz bekommt) beeinflussen.

CONTRA:
- Lobby mit Überlebenden Freunden ist nicht möglich, nur wenn man selbst einen Killer spielt kann man seine Freunde einladen, die dann logischerweise Überlebende sind.
- Keine ingame Konversationsmöglichkeit, weder Chat noch Voice (vielleicht ist das aber gar nicht so schlecht)
- Überlebensrang ist wahnsinnig schwer zu halten (Da wäre eine Überarbeitung notwendig)

Toll wäre auch, wenn an dem Spiel noch mehr Charaktere, Spielmodi (was anderes als Generatoren anmachen), neue Maps und diverse Kleidung hinzufügen könnte. Man kann aus diesem Meisterwerk noch soviel machen und ich freu mich schon sehr drauf, sollte das auch kommen.

Klare Kaufempfehlung!


#EDIT#
- Man kann nun mit Freunden in einer Lobby spielen
- Hacker/Cheater gibt es leider trotzdem vereinzelt im Spiel
- Man sieht nun nicht mehr in der Lobby welcher Rang und Level andere Überlebende haben (Pluspunkt!) sondern erst nach der Runde
- Erstes großes Update mit neuem Killer, neuer Map, neuem Opfer - TOP!

Una arena 4v1 donde los sobrevivientes intentan escapar de las manos de un asesino. Si se juega solo quizá entre en la categoria de terror, pero en mi opinion no aterra. En resumen, un juego muy divertido, lleno de tension y momentos donde si te asustas no saldras vivo para contarlo. Depende mucho del sonido, por lo que unos buenos audifonos o bocinas mejoran considerablemente la experiencia.

Me gusta mucho la verdah 10/10 IGN

This game is currently shit. I would recommend buying it even if it was on sale for $15. Maybe if it was $10 or under. But as of right now there is WAY too many cheap, gameplay wise, things in the game. You never want to play the killer because the survivors or WAY too OP. The only way a killer can kill you it if you're an idiot or lag. You can infinitely jump through windows so the killer is completely unable to catch you.
Love this game, i recommend buying it. But I wish it had a system where you could queue up with friends, outside of the private match.

Dead by Daylight is the type of game that just gets better and better. With new content coming out regularly it prevents the game from becoming stale or boring. Sure it has its bugs and broken things but every single game ever made will have those issues! All in all I would recommend DBD to anyone looking for a really fun game that you can enjoy yourself or with friends! 8/10

Oyunda 4 kurban 1 katil var. Kurbanlar belli sınırları olan ve sınırlarının etrafı duvarla çevrili olan maplarin içinde 1 katil ile birlikteler. Kurbanların amacı ise mapdeki jeneratörleri çalıştırarak mapin 2 ucundaki ayrı 2 kapıya güç verip kapıyı çalıştırarak kaçmak. Rank modunda kurbanların 4 kişi katilin 1 kişi olması mecvurdir. Fakat arkadaşlarla oynandığında kurbanların sayısı ne kadar olursa olsun (max 4 kurban) oynanabiliniyor ve kurban sayısına göre jeneratör sayısıda değişiyor. Tabi Rank modunda kurbanların sayısı 4 olması mecvuriyetinden jeneratör sayısıda belli (5 jeneratör). Oyunda kurbanların en büyük silahı TAKIM ÇALIŞMASI. Katilin amacı ise kurbanlar kaçmadan hepsini öldürmek. Oyun atmosferik ve keyifli bir oyun. Oyunla ilgili keyifli dakikaları ve oyunla ilgili ayrıntıları izlemek, takip etmek, görmek isterseniz size Taşkınlık Parkı ve Amonthos'un Gemisi adlı 2 youtube kanalını öneririm. İyi oyunlar, İyi eğlenceler. :)

Bitte Mindestanforderungen nächstes mal überprüfen, Ich erfülle diese und es funktioniert überhaupt nicht, springt einfach von selbst auf den Desktop und dann geht ohne Task Manager gar nichts mehr, ziemlich enttäuschend so far.
